thread.section_title: Mikes Dive Store Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of mikesdivestore.com
thread.title: Matthew Brown
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Matthew Brown

author: Matthew Brown
title: Matthew Brown
text: Bought some prescription goggles but due to being almost too efficient - original set sent too quickly without lenses being fitted. Realising mistake, another set despatched almost immediately behind the other with follow up and courtesy calls to match - top drawer - well done MDS!!!
